Seal characters (1)

楥字的基本解释

楥
xuàn
同“楦”。

楥
yuán
柜柳的别称。
篱笆：“楥菊茂新芳”。

楥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuàn］
同“楦1”。
[②]［yuán］
［《集韻》于元切，平元，云。］
(1)木名。即榉柳。
(2)篱笆。南朝梁庾肩吾《暮游山水应令赋得碛字》：“細藤初上楥，新流漸涵磧。”唐韩愈《守戒》：“今人有宅於山者，知猛獸之爲害，則必高其柴楥，而外施窞穽以待之。”清程穆衡《思乐园记》：“編芳爲楥，楥外濬溝。”一说为篱笆的支柱。

楥字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楥； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页540第17
【唐韻】虛願切【集韻】【韻會】呼願切【正韻】翾眩切，?暄去聲。俗作楦。【說文】履法也。【徐曰】織履中模範，故曰法。【朝野僉載】唐楊炯每呼朝士爲麒麟楥。曰：今弄假麒麟者，必修飾其形，覆之驢背，及去皮，還是驢。　又【類篇】於眷切。木名。【爾雅·釋木】楥，柜枊。　又【集韻】于元切，音袁。義同。　又【正韻】于權切，音員。絡絲籰。籰字原从賏从夂作，不从矍。

楥字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
楥字的起名意思

指柜柳的别称或篱笆。

xuàn
Same as "Last".
Long
yuán
Another name for the willow.
Fence: "Chujumao Xinfang".
Long
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuàn］
Same as "Last 1".
[②]［yuán］
["Jiyun" Yu Yuanqie, Pingyuan, Yun. ]
(1) Wooden name. The beech willow.
(2) Fence. The Southern Dynasties Liang Yu Jianwu "The Muyou Landscape Should Order Fu Deqi Characters": "The fine vines begin to rise, and the new stream gradually covers the moraine." Tang Hanyu "Shoujie": "Nowadays, there are people who live in the mountains, and they know the beasts. If you do harm, you must raise the firewood and wait for it." Qingcheng Muheng's "Thinking of Paradise": "Edit the fragrance for the tree, and the tree outside the ditch." It is said that it is the pillar of the fence.
Long
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楥; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 540 Page 17
[Tang Yun] Xu Wish Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Wish Cut [Zheng Yun] Dizzy cut,? Xun. Popular as last. 【Said the text】Fulfill the law. [Xu Yue] Model in weaving shoes, so it is called method. [The court and the wild] Tang Yangjiong always called the dynasty to be a unicorn. Said: Those who make fake unicorns today must modify their shape, cover the back of the donkey, and peel off the skin. It is still a donkey.　[Classes] Yujuan cut. Wooden name. 【Erya·Shimu】Cabinet, cabinet.　[Jiyun] Yu Yuanqie, sound Yuan. The same meaning.　[Zheng Yun] Yu Quanqie, voice clerk. Luosiyan. The word 籰 was originally written from the widow and from the 夂, not from the 矍.
